job.title: Executive Vice President and Chief Operating Officer
job.description: ltpgttrust for americas health tfah a leading nonprofit nonpartisan public health policy research and advocacy organization in washington dc is recruiting an executive vicepresident and chief operating officer if you are committed to strengthening the nations public health infrastructure with a focus on health equity tfah may be the place for youltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtthe executive vice president and chief operating officer will be a seasoned and innovative leader with deep knowledge of the public health policy landscape a strong operational skillset and significant management experienceampnbspthe ideal candidate will have a minimum of years of experience in senior leadership roles in policy advocacy andor public health organizations extensive knowledge of federal legislative regulatory and budget processes decisionmakers and key stakeholdersampnbspa masters degree in public policy public health juris doctor or the equivalent is strongly preferred candidates may submit their cover letter outlining their interest and qualifications along with their resume via npags candidate portal httpsrecruitcrmioapplyltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgt
